item.title: My shortcuts
item.description: XCode Shortcuts shortcut Description Cmd + Shift + O open file by name. Cmd + Shift + J show file in project tree. Cmd + Shift + F search in the whole project. Ctrl + I indent lines. Open project or file with Visual Studio open ~/.bash_profile or open ~/.zshrc Adding the next line code () { VSCODE_CWD="$PWD" open -n -b "com.
